alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 12:21AM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Owyhee County through 100 AM MDT... At 1221 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dollar Butte to near Black Stone Mountain. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Turner Butte, Tindall Ranch and Black Stone Mountain around 1230 AM MDT. Grasmere around 1240 AM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
